このx64 Smartコンポーネントは、次のストレージコントローラー：SmartアレイP220i, P222, P420i, P420, P421, P721m, およびP822のファームウェアを提供します。
이 x64 스마트 구성 요소는 다음과 같은 스토리지 컨트롤러용 펌웨어를 제공합니다. 스마트 어레이 P220i, P222, P420i, P420, P421, P721m 및 P822
此 x64 智慧型元件提供適用於下列儲存控制器的韌體： Smart Array P220i、P222、P420i、P420、P421、P721m 及 P822

installation_notes_xlate.installation_notes_xlate_part:
To update firmware from Linux operating system on target server:

Updating firmware with rpm installed:

  • Install the firmware rpm using the command:  rpm -ivh <rpm_filename>.  This extracts the contents of the rpm to the '/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu' location
  • The CP033363.scexe script is located in the 'scexe-compat' folder. The actual name of the 'firmware-smartarray-46a4d957a7-*' folder is based on the version of the rpm installed in the first step above
  • To install firmware, you can execute ONE of the following commands: 

               # ./CP033363.scexe in the '/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/scexe-compat' location (OR)

               # ./setup in the '/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/firmware-smartarray-46a4d957a7-*' location

  • The results of the firmware upgrade are saved to the Component.log file, located in the /var/cpq/ directory
  • To uninstall the rpm, run the command: rpm -e <rpm_package_name>, which is the rpm filename without the '.rpm' extension

Updating firmware without installing the rpm:

  • Extract the contents of the rpm using the command: rpm2cpio <rpm_filename>.rpm | cpio -id.  This extracts the contents of the rpm to 'usr' folder in the current directory
  • Navigate to the 'usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/firmware-smartarray-46a4d957a7-*' location and run ./setup to update the firmware. The actual name of the 'firmware-smartarray-46a4d957a7-*' folder is based on the version of the rpm installed in the step above
  • The results of the firmware upgrade are saved to the Component.log file, located in the /var/cpq/ directory

Additional Information:

Installing the firmware rpm package (rpm -ivh) does not update the firmware.  It merely extracts the rpm content to the local system. Updating the firmware on the local system requires following the above outlined steps

To use HP Smart Update Manager from the Service Pack for ProLiant:

Offline:

  • Place the Service Pack for ProLiant on a USB key using the USB Key Utility for Windows.
  • Place the desired firmware to be updated in the directory, /SPP20xxxxx/packages on the USB key.
  • Boot from the newly created Service Pack for Proliant USB key.
  • Follow Smart Update Manager steps to complete firmware update.

Online:

  • Login as root. (You must be root in order to apply the ROM update.)
  • Place the desired firmware to be updated in the directory, /SPP20xxxxx/packages
  • Run launch_sum.sh script which is found in the root of the ISO
  • Follow the instructions on the screen

documentation_notes_xlate.documentation_notes_xlate_part:
Deliverable Name:
     Supplemental Update / Online ROM Flash Component for Linux (x64) - Smart Array P220i, P222, P420i, P420, P421, P721m, and P822
 

Release Version and/or Date:
     8.32

Last Recommended or Critical Version:
     8.00   

Previous Version of Firmware:
     8.00

Firmware Dependency:
     None

Enhancements/New Features:

  • Improved accuracy of drive temperature reporting feature

Problems Fixed:

  • System can potentially stop responding with no lockup code due to livelock condition where the RAID Stack thread is polling a queue for a completion to be returned by the base code firmware

Known Issues:
     None

Deliverable Name:

7.02 版本修复的问题：

  • 配置为备用驱动器的物理驱动器可能比预期更快地指示预测故障。
  • 运行期间控制器可能停止响应（POST锁定0x13）。
  • 当启用驱动器写入缓存时，出现协议错误。
  • 热插拔更换硬盘驱动器后，HP Smart Storage Administrator显示错误的硬盘固件版本和升级建议。

7.02 (B) 版本解决的问题：

  • 组件无法在配有两个或多个连接到 HPE 主机总线适配器 H22x 的外部驱动器机箱的系统中安装固件。将报告以下消息 -“设备在树中多次出现”。在只有一个连接到 HPE 主机总线适配器 H22x 的外部驱动器机箱的配置中不出现固件安装失败问题。

Problems Fixed in 7.02:

  • A physical drive configured as a spare drive might indicate predictive failure sooner than expected.
  • Controller might stop responding during run-time (POST Lockup 0x13).
  • When drive write-cache is enabled, protocol errors are observed.
  • After hot-plug replacement of a hard disk drive, incorrect hard disk drive firmware version and upgrade recommendation were displayed by HP Smart Storage Administrator.

Problems Fixed in 7.02 (B):

  • Component would fail to install firmware in a system configured with two or more external drive enclosures attached to an HPE Host Bus Adapter H22x. The following message would be reported - “Device appears more than once in tree”. The firmware installation failure was not observed in configurations having only one external drive enclosure attached to an HPE Host Bus Adapter H22x.

Problems Fixed in 7.02:

  • A physical drive configured as a spare drive might indicate predictive failure sooner than expected.
  • Controller might stop responding during run-time (POST Lockup 0x13).
  • When drive write-cache is enabled, protocol errors are observed.
  • After hot-plug replacement of a hard disk drive, incorrect hard disk drive firmware version and upgrade recommendation were displayed by HP Smart Storage Administrator.

  • Component would fail to install firmware in a system configured with two or more external drive enclosures attached to an HPE Host Bus Adapter H22x. The following message would be reported - “Device appears more than once in tree”. The firmware installation failure was not observed in configurations having only one external drive enclosure attached to an HPE Host Bus Adapter H22x.

バージョン7.02で修正された問題：

  • スペアドライブとして構成された物理ドライブが、予想よりも早く障害予測を示すことがあります。
  • コントローラーが実行時に応答を停止することがあります(POST Lockup 0x13)。
  • ドライブの書き込みキャッシュが有効な場合、プロトコルエラーが観察されます。
  • ハードディスクドライブのホットプラグ交換後、 HP Smart Storage Administratorが誤ったハードディスクドライブのファームウェアバージョンおよびアップグレード推奨を表示していました。

バージョン7.02(B)で修正された問題：

  • コンポーネントは、HPE ホストバスアダプター H22xへ接続されている2つ以上の外部ドライブエンクロージャーで構成されるシステムへファームウェアのインストールをすると失敗する場合があります。「ドライブがツリー内に数回表示されています」というメッセージが表示されます。ドライブファームウェアインストールの失敗は、HPEホストバスアダプター H22xへ接続されている外部ドライブエンクロージャーが一つしかない構成では見られませんでした。

7.02에서 해결된 문제:

  • 예비 드라이브로 구성된 물리적 드라이브가 예상보다 빨리 예측 오류를 표시할 수 있습니다.
  • 컨트롤러가 런타임 동안 응답을 중지할 수 있습니다(POST 잠김 0x13).
  • 드라이브 쓰기-캐시가 활성화되어 있을 때 프로토콜 오류가 관찰됩니다.
  • 하드 디스크 드라이브의 핫 플러그 교체 후 HP 스마트 스토리지 관리자에서 하드 디스크 드라이브 펌웨어 버전 및 업그레이드 권장 사항을 잘못 표시합니다.

7.02(B)에서 해결된 문제:

  • 구성 요소가 HPE 호스트 버스 어댑터 H22x에 연결된 외장 드라이브 인클로저 두 개 이상으로 구성된 시스템에서 펌웨어 설치에 실패합니다. "장치가 트리에 두 번 이상 나타납니다"라는 메시지가 보고될 수 있습니다. HP 호스트 버스 어댑터 H22x에 연결된 외장 드라이브 인클로저가 한 개 뿐인 구성에서는 펌웨어 설치 실패가 관찰되지 않았습니다.

7.02 版中修正的問題：

  • 設定為備用磁碟機的實體磁碟機可能會比預期更快指示預測故障。
  • 執行時期期間控制器可能停止回應 (POST 鎖定 0x13)。
  • 啟用磁碟機寫入快取時，會觀察到通訊協定錯誤。
  • 熱插拔更換硬碟機後，HP Smart Storage Administrator (HP 智慧型儲存管理員) 會顯示不正確的硬碟機韌體版本與升級建議。

7.02(B) 版中修正的問題：

  • 元件在設定使用連接至 HPE 主機匯流排配接卡 H22x 的兩個或多個外接磁碟機機櫃的系統中安裝韌體失敗。會報告下列訊息 -「Device appears more than once in tree」(裝置在樹狀結構中出現一次以上)。在只有一部外接磁碟機機櫃連接至 HPE 主機匯流排配接卡 H22x 的組態中，不出現磁碟機韌體安裝失敗。

• 配置为备用驱动器的物理驱动器可能比预期更快地指示预测故障。
  • 运行期间控制器可能停止响应（POST锁定0x13）。
  • 当启用驱动器写入缓存时，出现协议错误。
  • 热插拔更换硬盘驱动器后，HP Smart Storage Administrator显示错误的硬盘固件版本和升级建议。

• A physical drive configured as a spare drive might indicate predictive failure sooner than expected.
  • Controller might stop responding during run-time (POST Lockup 0x13).
  • When drive write-cache is enabled, protocol errors are observed.

revision_fixes_xlate.revision_fixes_xlate_part:
已解决的问题：

  • 所有使用2.2 TB或更大的卷配置GPT分区的UEFI系统的严重问题。更多详情，请参阅客户顾问文档#c04602001
  • 当一控制器设置为RAID6模式，且系统硬盘驱动器产生大量可恢复错误时，控制器可能进入降级模式并停止运行。在随后重启的加电自检（POST）和在集成管理日志（Integrated Management Log，即IML）中，将显示0x0E错误消息
  • 当设置为RAID 6模式时，控制器将向HP智能存储管理器（HP Smart Storage Administrator，即HP SSA）报告0xE0错误，并停止运行
  • 驱动器安装在HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8服务器的托架1时，SSD SATA 6G驱动器间歇性发生故障
  • 不能修复的ECC错误导致控制器停止响应（锁定0x13）。该版智能阵列固件正确计算要求的最大控制器内存带宽，以承受当前逻辑驱动器配置的流写入操作，并减少不需要最大控制器内存带宽配置下的高速缓存内存速度。当以较低内存数量运行时，消耗较少的功耗，因而性能降级可以忽略。更多详情，请参阅客户顾问文档c03755983
  • 与HP ProLiant BL460c Gen9刀片式服务器一起配置时，无法识别HP D2220sb刀片式服务器。更多详情，请参阅客户顾问文档#c04602866

Problems Fixed:

  • Critical issue for all UEFI systems using 2.2 TB or greater volumes configured with GPT partitions. For additional information please refer to the customer advisory # c04602001
  • When a controller was set to RAID6 mode and a large number of recoverable errors were generated by hard disk drives in the system, the controller might go into a degraded mode and cease to function. A 0x0E error message would display during POST on subsequent power cycle and in the Integrated Management Log (IML)
  • The controller would report 0xE0 error to HP Smart Storage Administrator (HP SSA) and would cease to function when set to RAID 6 mode
  • Intermittent SSD SATA 6G drive failures would occur when drive was configured in Bay 1 of HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8 Server
  • Uncorrectable ECC errors would cause the controller to stop responding (Lockup 0x13).  This version of Smart Array firmware properly calculates the maximum controller memory bandwidth required to sustain streaming write operations with the current logical drive configuration and reduces the cache memory speed on configurations that do not require peak controller memory bandwidth.  When running at the slower memory speed, less power is consumed and performance degradation is expected to be negligible. For additional information, reference Customer Advisory # c03755983
  • The HP D2220sb Storage Blade is not recognized when configuring it with the HP ProLiant BL460c Gen9 Server Blade. For additional information please refer to the customer advisory # c04602866

  • Intermittent SSD SATA 6G drive failures would occur when drive was configured in Bay 1 of HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8 Server

  • The HP D2220sb Storage Blade is not recognized when configuring it with the HP ProLiant BL460c Gen9 Server Blade. For additional information please refer to the customer advisory # c04602866

修正された問題点：

  • GPTパーティションで構成された2.2TBより大きなボリュームを使っているすべてのUEFIシステムのクリティカル問題。 詳細についてはカスタマーアドバイザリ# c04602001を参照してください
  • コントローラーがRAID6モードに設定され、多数の回復可能なエラーがシステム内のハードディスクドライブによって生成された場合、コントローラーは劣化モードに入り、機能しなくなることがありました。 0x0Eエラーメッセージが、その後の電源再投入のPOST中およびインテグレーテッドマネジメントログ（IML）に表示されました
  • RAID 6モードに設定されたときにコントローラーはHP Smart Storage Administrator (HP SSA)に0xE0エラーを報告し機能を中止しました
  • ドライブがHP ProLiant BL465 Gen8サーバーのベイ1に構成された場合、断続的にSSD SATA 6Gドライブ障害が発生しました
  • 訂正不能ECCエラーが、コントローラーの応答停止を引き起こしました (Lockup 0x13)。 このバージョンのSmartアレイファームウェアは、現在の論理ドライブ構成でストリーミング書き込み操作を維持するために必要な最大のコントローラーメモリ帯域幅を適切に計算し、ピークのコントローラーメモリ帯域幅を必要としない構成で、キャッシュメモリ速度を削減します。 低速のメモリ速度で動作する場合、より少ない電力消費でパフォーマンスの低下はごくわずかであると予想されます。 詳細については、カスタマーアドバイザリ # c03755983を参照してください
  • HP ProLiant BL460ｃ Gen9サーバーブレードを構成しているとき、HP D2220sb Storage Bladeは認識されません。 詳細についてはカスタマーアドバイザリ# c04602866を参照してください

해결된 문제:

  • GPT 파티션을 사용하여 구성된 2.2TB 이상의 볼륨을 사용하는 모든 UEFI 시스템에 대한 중요한 문제가 있습니다. 자세한 내용은 고객 권고 # c04602001을 참조하십시오.
  • 컨트롤러가 RAID6 모드로 설정되어 있고 시스템의 하드 디스크 드라이브로 인해 복구 가능한 오류가 대량 생성된 경우 컨트롤러가 성능 저하 모드로 전환되고 작동이 중단될 수 있습니다. IML(Integrated Management Log) 및 후속 전원 주기에서 POST 중에 0x0E 오류 메시지가 표시됩니다.
  • 컨트롤러가 HP 스마트 스토리지 관리자(HP SSA)에 0xE0 오류를 보고하고 RAID 6 모드로 설정되면 작동을 중단합니다.
  • 드라이브가 HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8 서버의 베이 1에 구성되어 있는 경우 일시적 SSD SATA 6G 드라이브 오류가 발생합니다.
  • 수정 불가능한 ECC 오류로 인해 컨트롤러의 응답이 중지됩니다(잠금 0x13).  이 버전의 Smart Array 펌웨어는 현재의 논리 드라이브 구성을 사용하여 쓰기 작업 스트리밍 유지에 필요한 최대 컨트롤러 메모리 대역폭을 계산하여 최고 컨트롤러 메모리 대역폭이 필요 없는 구성에 대한 캐시 메모리 속도를 낮춥니다.  더 늦은 메모리 속도로 구동되는 경우 전력이 덜 소모되며 성능 저하는 무시해도 될 것으로 예상됩니다. 자세한 내용은 고객 권고 # c03755983을 참조하십시오.
  • HP ProLiant BL460c Gen9 서버 블레이드를 사용하여 구성한 경우 HP D2220sb 스토리지 블레이드가 인식되지 않습니다. 자세한 내용은 고객 권고 # c04602866을 참조하십시오.

修正的問題：

  • 所有設定為使用 GPT 分割區的使用 2.2 TB 或以上磁碟區的 UEFI 系統的重大問題。如需詳細資料，請參閱客戶諮詢 # c04602001
  • 當控制器被設為 RAID6 模式並且系統中的硬碟機產生大量可復原錯誤時，控制器可能會進入降級模式並停止運作。在後續關閉接著開啟電源 POST 期間會顯示 0x0E 錯誤訊息並且記錄在整合式管理記錄 (IML) 中
  • 設定為 RAID 6 模式時，控制器會報告 0xE0 錯誤至 HP Smart Storage Administrator (HP 智慧型儲存管理員 (HP SSA)) 並且無法運作
  • 在 HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8 伺服器的插槽 1 中配置磁碟機時，會間歇性發生 SSD SATA 6G 磁碟機故障
  • 無法修正的 ECC 錯誤導致控制器停止回應 (鎖定 0x13)。此版本智慧陣列韌體正確計算運用目前邏輯磁碟機組態來維持串流寫入作業所需的最大控制器記憶體頻寬，並且減少不需要峰值控制器記憶體頻寬的組態的快取記憶體速度。以較慢的記憶體速度執行時，消耗更少的電源且效能的降低可忽略不計。如需詳細資料，請參閱客戶諮詢 # c03755983
  • 使用 HP ProLiant BL460c Gen9 刀鋒型伺服器設定 HP D2220sb 儲存刀鋒型伺服器時，無法辨識 HP D2220sb 儲存刀鋒型伺服器。如需詳細資料，請參閱客戶諮詢 # c04602866

已解决的问题：
  • 修复了在HBA模式下在SATA驱动器上运行IO时，罕见的控制器挂起的问题。

Problems Fixed:
  • Fix for a rare controller hang when running IO to SATA drives when in HBA-mode.

Problems Fixed:
  • Fix for a rare controller hang when running IO to SATA drives when in HBA-mode.

Problems Fixed:
  • Fix for a rare controller hang when running IO to SATA drives when in HBA-mode.

Problems Fixed:
  • Fix for a rare controller hang when running IO to SATA drives when in HBA-mode.

修正された問題点：
  • HBAモードで、SATAドライブへのIOを実行する場合のまれなコントローラーのハングアップを修正します。

해결된 문제:
  • 드물지만 HBA 모드에서 SATA 드라이브에 IO를 실행할 때 컨트롤러가 중단되는 문제를 해결했습니다.

修正的問題：
  • 修正在 HBA 模式中時執行 SATA 磁碟機 IO 時罕見的控制器當機的問題。

revision_fixes_xlate.revision_fixes_xlate_part:
已解决的问题：

  • 当设置为RAID 6模式时，控制器将向HP智能存储管理器报告0xE0错误，并停止运行。
  • HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8服务器的托架1的SSD SATA 6G驱动器间歇性发生故障。
  • 不能修复的 ECC 错误导致控制器挂起（锁定 0x13）。智能阵列固件计算要求的最大控制器内存带宽，以承受当前逻辑驱动器配置的流写入操作，并减少不需要最大控制器内存带宽配置下的高速缓存内存速度。当以较低内存数量运行时，消耗较少的功耗，因而性能降级可以忽略。如欲了解更多信息，请参考客户顾问文档 c03755983，网址为： http://h20564.www2.hp.com/portal/site/hpsc/public/kb/docDisplay/?docId=emr_na-c03755983

Problems Fixed:

  • The controller would report 0xE0 error to HP Smart Storage Administrator and would cease to function when set to RAID 6 mode.
  • Intermittent SSD SATA 6G drive failure in Bay 1 of the HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8 Server.
  • Uncorrectable ECC errors causing controller to hang (Lockup 0x13).  Smart Array firmware calculates the maximum controller memory bandwidth required to sustain streaming write operations with the current logical drive configuration and reduces the cache memory speed on configurations that do not require peak controller memory bandwidth.  When running at the slower memory speed, less power is consumed and performance degradation is expected to be negligible. For additional information, reference Customer Advisory c03755983 at the following URL: http://h20564.www2.hp.com/portal/site/hpsc/public/kb/docDisplay/?docId=emr_na-c03755983

修正された問題点：

  • RAID 6モードに設定されたときにコントローラーはHP Smart Storage Administratorに0xE0エラーを報告し機能を中止しました。
  • HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8サーバーのベイ 1での断続的なSSD SATA 6Gドライブ障害。
  • 訂正不能ECCエラーがコントローラーのハングアップを引き起こします(ロックアップ 0x13)。 Smartアレイファームウェアは、現在の論理ドライブ構成でストリーミング書き込み操作を維持するために必要な最大のコントローラーメモリ帯域幅を計算し、ピークのコントローラーメモリ帯域幅を必要としない構成で、キャッシュメモリ速度を削減します。 低速のメモリ速度で動作する場合、より少ない電力消費でパフォーマンスの低下はごくわずかであると予想されます。 詳しくは、以下のURLのカスタマーアドバイザリc03755983を参照してください。 http://h20564.www2.hp.com/portal/site/hpsc/public/kb/docDisplay/?docId=emr_na-c03755983

해결된 문제:

  • 컨트롤러가 HP Smart Storage Administrator에 0xE0 오류를 보고하고 RAID 6 모드로 설정된 경우 작동을 중단합니다.

  • 컨트롤러 중단을 유발하는 수정 불가능한 ECC 오류(록업 0x13).  Smart Array 펌웨어는 현재의 논리 드라이브 구성을 사용하여 쓰기 작업 스트리밍 유지에 필요한 최대 메모리 대역폭을 계산하여 최대 컨트롤러 메모리 대역폭이 필요 없는 구성에 대한 캐시 메모리 속도를 낮춥니다.  더 늦은 메모리 속도로 구동되는 경우 전력이 덜 소모되며 성능 저하는 무시해도 될 것으로 예상됩니다. 자세한 정보는 다음 URL을 통해 제공되는 고객 권고사항 c03755983을 참조하십시오. http://h20564.www2.hp.com/portal/site/hpsc/public/kb/docDisplay/?docId=emr_na-c03755983.

Problems Fixed:

  • The controller would report 0xE0 error to HP Smart Storage Administrator and would cease to function when set to RAID 6 mode.
  • Intermittent SSD SATA 6G drive failure in Bay 1 of the HP ProLiant BL465 Gen8 Server.
  • Uncorrectable ECC errors causing controller to hang (Lockup 0x13).  Smart Array firmware calculates the maximum controller memory bandwidth required to sustain streaming write operations with the current logical drive configuration and reduces the cache memory speed on configurations that do not require peak controller memory bandwidth.  When running at the slower memory speed, less power is consumed and performance degradation is expected to be negligible. For additional information, reference Customer Advisory c03755983 at the following URL: http://h20564.www2.hp.com/portal/site/hpsc/public/kb/docDisplay/?docId=emr_na-c03755983

revision_fixes_xlate.revision_fixes_xlate_part:
6.00 版本修复的问题：
该版固件解决了以下问题：

  • 在零内存RAID (ZMR) 模式下运行的系统上执行内核转储（kdump）时，控制器可能停止响应。
  • HP智能阵列P420控制器连接到扩展背板和非扩展背板时，控制器不能正确控制SmartCarrier LED指示灯。
  • Chkdsk运行缓慢。

Problems Fixed in version 6.00:
This firmware release resolved the following issues:

  • When executing kdump on systems running in Zero Memory RAID (ZMR) mode, the controller might halt.
  • When an HP Smart Array P420 controller was attached to both an expander backplane and non-expander backplane, the controller would not properly control SmartCarrier LEDs.
  • Chkdsk was running slowly.

Problems Fixed in version 6.00:
This firmware release resolved the following issues:

  • When executing kdump on systems running in Zero Memory RAID (ZMR) mode, the controller might halt.
  • When an HP Smart Array P420 controller was attached to both an expander backplane and non-expander backplane, the controller would not properly control SmartCarrier LEDs.
  • Chkdsk was running slowly.

Problems Fixed in version 6.00:
This firmware release resolved the following issues:

  • When executing kdump on systems running in Zero Memory RAID (ZMR) mode, the controller might halt.
  • When an HP Smart Array P420 controller was attached to both an expander backplane and non-expander backplane, the controller would not properly control SmartCarrier LEDs.
  • Chkdsk was running slowly.

  • When an HP Smart Array P420 controller was attached to both an expander backplane and non-expander backplane, the controller would not properly control SmartCarrier LEDs.
  • Chkdsk was running slowly.

Problems Fixed in version 6.00:

  • When executing kdump on systems running in Zero Memory RAID (ZMR) mode, the controller might halt.
  • When an HP Smart Array P420 controller was attached to both an expander backplane and non-expander backplane, the controller would not properly control SmartCarrier LEDs.
  • Chkdsk was running slowly.

バージョン6.00で修正された問題：
このファームウェアリリースは、次の問題を解決しました。

  • Zero Memory RAID (ZMR)モードで実行しているシステムでkdumpを実行すると、コントローラーは停止することがあります。
  • HP SmartアレイP420コントローラーがエキスパンダーバックプレーンと非エキスパンダーバックプレーンの両方に接続されたた場合、コントローラーはSmartCarrier LEDを正しく制御しません。
  • Chkdskの実行が遅かった。

버전 6.00에서 해결된 문제:
이 펌웨어 릴리스에서 다음과 같은 문제가 해결되었습니다.

  • Zero Memory RAID(ZMR) 모드에서 실행 중인 시스템에 kdump를 실행할 때 컨트롤러가 정지할 수 있습니다.
  • HP 스마트 어레이 P420 컨트롤러가 익스팬더 백플레인 및 비익스팬 더 백플레인 둘 다에 장착되어 있을 때, 컨트롤러가 SmartCarrier LED를 올바로 제어하지 않습니다.
  • Chkdsk가 느리게 실행됩니다.

6.00 版中修正的問題：
此韌體版本已解決下列問題：

  • 在零記憶體 RAID (ZMR) 模式中執行的系統上執行 kdump 時，控制器可能會暫停。
  • HP Smart Array P420 控制器已連接至擴充背板與非擴充背板，控制器不會適當控制 SmartCarrier LED。
  • Chkdsk 執行速度變慢。

  • Chkdskの実行が遅かった。

버전 6.00에서 해결된 문제:
이 펌웨어 릴리스에서 다음과 같은 문제가 해결되었습니다.

  • Zero Memory RAID(ZMR) 모드에서 실행 중인 시스템에 kdump를 실행할 때 컨트롤러가 정지할 수 있습니다.
  • HP 스마트 어레이 P420 컨트롤러가 익스팬더 백플레인 및 비익스팬 더 백플레인 둘 다에 장착되어 있을 때, 컨트롤러가 SmartCarrier LED를 올바로 제어하지 않습니다.
  • Chkdsk가 느리게 실행됩니다.

6.00 版中修正的問題：
此韌體版本已解決下列問題：

  • 在零記憶體 RAID (ZMR) 模式中執行的系統上執行 kdump 時，控制器可能會暫停。
  • HP Smart Array P420 控制器已連接至擴充背板與非擴充背板，控制器不會適當控制 SmartCarrier LED。
  • Chkdsk 執行速度變慢。

reboot_details.reboot_details_xlate: 安装之后必须重启才能使更新生效并保持硬件稳定性。
Reboot is required after installation for updates to take effect and hardware stability to be maintained.
アップデートの効果とハードウェアの安定を得るために、インストール後の再起動は必要です。
업데이트가 적용되고 하드웨어 안정성이 유지되려면 설치 후 재부팅해야 합니다.
安裝後必須重新啟動，更新才會生效，並維持硬體穩定。
